name: 3D Movie Maker

files.file2: N/A: Please select setup.exe from 3DMovie100 CD

content:
files:
- file1: http://www.3dmmfiles.com/uploads/homyguyz/utilities/3dmmnocd.zip
- file2: 'N/A: Please select setup.exe from 3DMovie100 CD'
game:
  args: timidity -Os -iA
  exe: ~/.wine/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Kids/3D Movie Maker/3dmovie.exe
  working_dir: ~/.wine/drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Microsoft Kids/3D Movie Maker
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
wine:
  Desktop: false
